title: Jocuserious
author: Jocuserious
content: Politics has become a business in some number of countries i know. Where people from younger to older age are all affected. They are doing politics to gain their power. In all these countries murders, fights, thefts, robberies have increased because they are doing these bad activities using political power.Disadvantages of politics:1. The number of your enemies will increase2. It will be a waste of money.3. Your time will be wasted.4. You may have the possibility of death.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Politics are necessary because without them, who would build the roads? Libertarian joke… More seriously, politics are necessary for many reasons but the government has also grown wildly out of control. I don’t think taxes were meant to be ever increasing, nor do I think countries were meant to take on debts. Modern day politics are way too intrusive on our lives.

comments.author: Pingrapole
comments.body: Many people have become great in the world only by politics politics can make a country move forward and backward because it requires four organs to run a state which statesmen fail to do.And statesman comes from politics Abraham Lincoln Judge Washington Barack Obama Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Mahatma Gandhi. I am Arafat Nelson Mandela and many others have all come through politics. Politics always teaches bad things. Not through proper education. Good intentions and honest and hard work if one conducts politics.Then it will surely be good and good for all. Politics is necessary to run a state and lead the country Currently the good side of politics is not being used only the bad side is being used Leaders are only leaders to corrupt and abuse power and those who have power are using this policy.A fair politics helps the country to develop beautifullyPolitics will prevent you from leading your life properly, money, time and property will be a waste if you all don't help and if good leadership and quality can lead politics eg.Like Abraham Lincoln Sheikh Mujibur Rahman if you can do politics then you don't have to use money or anything but people's love and you will move forward.I am not a student of political science but still I say politics is very important for the country but that would be healthy normal politics sick politics is not useful or desirable for the country It is normal that the number of enemies will increase but more than that ten times the number of your friends will increase who will respect you and respect you a lot and respect you which will bring you a lot of peace.And it will also arouse the interest to do good work Many people say that elections cost a lot of money and do bad things to collect it. Actually we force them to do bad things. We don't have money in the name of votes and we try to take money from them in different ways.As a result, it is natural that they try to withdraw money after passing And currently those who are running the country, whether the secretary or the foreign cadre or others who are managing them, who are the politicians, politics is very necessary to manage the development of the country.Finally, I can say that the country cannot run without politics. How will the country's foreign policy run? What benefits will the citizens of the country get? Who will take the responsibility to protect the country?Roads, business infrastructure, health care, transport, communication, information technology, everything requires political power and people are bound to accept it and question it fairly.Politics alone can be extremely important for every state.

comments.author: sesterceshop
comments.body: I think the best way to think about politics is as a necessary evil. It's on us to keep our leaders in check and push them to do what's right.I really think blockchain tech could shake up politics for the better. Imagine easily following campaign funds and expenses – that could cut down on corruption and keep politicians more connected to the people they serve.I'm looking forward to how blockchain might revolutionize politics. It could really streamline government, and make it more transparent and accountable.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: This is the slightest defect of the policy.Politics dehumanizes you and turns you into an emotionless machine that seeks to achieve its goals regardless of human feelings.Politicians, to achieve their interests, do not care about lying, or even killing, or perhaps even destroying an entire nation in order to maintain their power.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Obviously politics are necessary. What is the alternative after all?We would go back to the stone age where civilization barely existed. Even tribes in the middle of nowhere have their own version of politics. They have a leader, advisors, shamans who are supposed to health the sick, etc.So even though I am aware of the bad things which come with politics, whether we like it or not, it is a necessary evil. It is easy to blame politics on many things, but without it our current way of life would not be possible. Instead demonizing politics, we should try to make it a more transparent and useful to reach the wellbeing of our societies.

comments.author: Poorman2
comments.body: In fact, politics is essential for a well-functioning social system. Because a little social system runs in such a systematic way that an essential element of politics is present in the system. Again politics can protect the rights of an individual or group and resolve disputes through fair democratic means.But it is also true that if politics is misused then the backbone economic problem of a country is created along with other problems.  Just as the mother does not give milk if the child does not cry, similarly it is impossible to maintain the independence of the backbone of the country without politics.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 29, 2023, 05:34:25 PMDisadvantages of politics:1. The number of your enemies will increase2. It will be a waste of money.3. Your time will be wasted.4. You may have the possibility of death.You are wrong mate. What you just itemized are the disadvantages of bad politics. Politics is good if it is practiced without bribery, corruption, and violence. It is not bad to choose your leaders freely without intimidation or any form of inducement. It is only in places where politics is expensive and seen as a do-or-die affair that you see most of these evils. It is mostly in Africa and some developing nations that politics is seen as war because of the gains from stealing public funds. Politics is not a waste of time or money because every society needs leaders who will control its affairs. It is not politics that increases enemies or leads to death it is evil politicians that do those things like that.

Many people have shut themselves in politics when they don't understand the importance of it.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 29, 2023, 05:34:25 PM2. It will be a waste of money.It's a waste of money if you lose. Should you be fortunate enough to gain some level of power, you'll probably be able to gain wealth off the position. It's how western politics works -- leverage your voting power for special interests groups, or trade on domestic and foreign stock markets while voting on legislation that will impact the price of certain stocks. Altruistic politicians are rare. Politics is a profitable industry if you can do it right.

It is as absurd as if someone started to claim that everything in the world depends on dentistry.
